column2: Abex Medical System Sdn. Bhd. was incorporated on 11th August 1981 and started its operation on 1st April 1982. The company core business are sales & services of medical equipment and started as the Sole Distributor of Toshiba Medical Imaging Equipment. Guided by The Founder & Management determined Principles of Work, Philosophy and Objectives as well as systematically structured operation guidelines and policies.
